title: You may soon be able to use AI in Microsoft Word, Outlook
description: Workers will be able to chat with Microsoft Copilot to help with tasks in apps including Word, Excel and Outlook.

title: Biden’s TikTok plan faces the same challenges that doomed Trump’s ban
description: The Biden administration’s push to force a sale of TikTok will meet a slew of constitutional and legal hurdles that toppled Trump’s failed executive order in 2020

title: Meta employees grill Mark Zuckerberg at all-hands meeting following layoffs
description: Facebook-parent Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg faced questions including how employees are supposed to trust him

title: Silicon Valley Bank’s implosion leaves a gaping hole for start-ups
description: The tech world relied on SVB for everything from mortgages to credit cards. Its implosion has left them reeling.

title: Don’t get hacked on Facebook. Do these 6 things now.
description: If you think you're safe from hackers and scammers on Facebook, you're wrong. Here's how to protect yourself.
